K_adj

Source: R/pop_model_K_adj.R
pop_model_K_adj.Rd

Define K_adj value.

Usage

pop_model_K_adj(replicates = 100, dat, mx, dx, Nyears = 250, H.mx = NULL)

Arguments

replicates

Number of replicates

dat

Life history data

mx

A projection matrix expression

dx

A matrix of density-dependence effect

Nyears

Years to run simulation

H.mx

A harm projection matrix

Value

A K_adj object to make adjustments

Details

Initialize populations and find carrying capacity for each life stage. Carrying capacity is defined at the adult stage and estimated for all other life-stages using the stable-stage distribution (i.e., if the carrying capacity of the adult stage was set to 100 the carrying capacity for a stage below (stage x) is the amount of stage x necessary to result in 100 adults at equilibrium conditions).

On this page
